select AutID, Name, ImgUrl, dr_curOrgName, dr_curOrgID, Address, Email, PortalUrl, PaperListUrl, InsTime, UpdTime, ElsAutID, ElsOrgID, Flag, Pic, dr_CitedCnt, CitedCnt_UpdTime, dr_PaperCnt, PaperCnt_UpdTime, dr_FirstAutCnt, FirstAutCnt_UpdTime, dr_CorrpAutCnt, CorrpAutCnt_UpdTime from core_Author

select ca.AutID, ca.Name, ca.ImgUrl, ca.Address, ca.Email, ca.PortalUrl, ca.PaperListUrl, ca.InsTime, ca.UpdTime, ca.ElsAutID, ca.ElsOrgID, ca.Flag, ca.Pic, ca.CitedCnt_UpdTime, ca.PaperCnt_UpdTime, ca.FirstAutCnt_UpdTime,ca.CorrpAutCnt_UpdTime, co.`Name` company,co.CnyID country from core_Author ca LEFT JOIN core_R_Aut_Org crao on ca.AutID=crao.AutID LEFT JOIN core_Organization co on crao.OrgID=co.OrgID where ca.AutID = #{0}

SELECT count(cp.PubID) num,cpubl.name name ,IFNULL(mm.IFactor,0) jif FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_Paper cp on cp.PapID = crpao.PapID LEFT JOIN core_Publication cpubl on cpubl.PubID = cp.PubID LEFT JOIN (select MAX(corp.IFactor) IFactor,corp.YearID,corp.PubID from core_PubIF corp GROUP BY corp.YearID,corp.PubID) mm on mm.PubID=cp.PubID where crpao.AutID =#{0} GROUP BY cp.PubID order BY mm.IFactor desc

SELECT count(cp.PubID) count,cpubl.name name ,IFNULL(mm.IFactor,0) jif FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_Paper cp on cp.PapID = crpao.PapID LEFT JOIN core_Publication cpubl on cpubl.PubID = cp.PubID LEFT JOIN (select MAX(corp.IFactor) IFactor,corp.YearID,corp.PubID from core_PubIF corp GROUP BY corp.YearID,corp.PubID) mm on mm.PubID=cp.PubID where crpao.AutID =#{0} GROUP BY cp.PubID order BY mm.IFactor desc limit 10
SELECT count(cp.PubID) published,cp.YearID year FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_Paper cp on cp.PapID = crpao.PapID where crpao.AutID =#{0} GROUP BY cp.YearID ORDER BY cp.YearID
SELECT sum(cp.dr_CitedCnt) citedList FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_Paper cp on cp.PapID = crpao.PapID where crpao.AutID =#{0} GROUP BY cp.YearID ORDER BY citedList desc

SELECT count(cp.PubID) count,cpubl.name proportions FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_Paper cp on cp.PapID = crpao.PapID LEFT JOIN core_Publication cpubl on cpubl.PubID = cp.PubID where crpao.AutID =#{0} GROUP BY cp.PubID order BY count desc limit 10
SELECT count(cp.PubID) count FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_Paper cp on cp.PapID = crpao.PapID LEFT JOIN core_Publication cpubl on cpubl.PubID = cp.PubID where crpao.AutID =#{0}

SELECT crrr.dr_OrgName affiliation,COUNT(1) count FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_R_Paper_Ref crpr ON crpao.PapID=crpr.CitedPapID LEFT JOIN core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crrr on crrr.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID where crpao.AutID=#{aid} and crrr.AutRank=1 and crrr.dr_OrgName is not NULL GROUP BY crrr.OrgID ORDER BY COUNT desc

SELECT crrr.dr_OrgName affiliation,COUNT(1) count FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_R_Paper_Ref crpr ON crpao.PapID=crpr.CitedPapID LEFT JOIN core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crrr on crrr.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID where crpao.AutID=#{aid} and crrr.AutRank=1 and crrr.dr_OrgName is not NULL GROUP BY crrr.OrgID ORDER BY COUNT desc limit #{limit};

SELECT COUNT(1) count FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_R_Paper_Ref crpr ON crpao.PapID=crpr.CitedPapID LEFT JOIN core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crrr on crrr.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID where crpao.AutID=#{0} and crrr.AutRank=1 and crrr.dr_OrgName is not NULL

SELECT co.CnyID country,COUNT(co.CnyID) count FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_R_Paper_Ref crpr ON crpao.PapID=crpr.CitedPapID LEFT JOIN core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crrr on crrr.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID LEFT JOIN core_Organization co on crrr.OrgID = co.OrgID where crpao.AutID=#{aid} and crrr.AutRank=1 and co.CnyID is not null GROUP BY co.CnyID ORDER BY count desc

SELECT co.CnyID country,COUNT(co.CnyID) count FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_R_Paper_Ref crpr ON crpao.PapID=crpr.CitedPapID LEFT JOIN core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crrr on crrr.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID LEFT JOIN core_Organization co on crrr.OrgID = co.OrgID where crpao.AutID=#{aid} and crrr.AutRank=1 and co.CnyID is not null GROUP BY co.CnyID ORDER BY count desc limit #{limit};

SELECT COUNT(co.CnyID) count FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_R_Paper_Ref crpr ON crpao.PapID=crpr.CitedPapID LEFT JOIN core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crrr on crrr.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID LEFT JOIN core_Organization co on crrr.OrgID = co.OrgID where crpao.AutID=#{aid} and crrr.AutRank=1 and co.CnyID is not null

SELECT COUNT(1) count ,kk.`Name` journal,kk.IFactor jif FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_R_Paper_Ref crpr ON crpao.PapID=crpr.CitedPapID LEFT JOIN core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crrr on crrr.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID LEFT JOIN core_Paper cp on cp.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID LEFT JOIN (SELECT cpu.PubID,cpif.IFactor,cpu.`Name` from core_PubIF cpif ,core_Publication cpu where cpu.PubID = cpif.PubID and cpif.YearID=2014) kk on kk.PubID = cp.PubID where crpao.AutID=#{aid} and crrr.AutRank=1 and kk.IFactor is not null GROUP BY kk.`Name`,kk.IFactor ORDER BY count desc

SELECT COUNT(1) count ,kk.`Name` journal,kk.IFactor jif FROM core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crpao LEFT JOIN core_R_Paper_Ref crpr ON crpao.PapID=crpr.CitedPapID LEFT JOIN core_R_Pap_Aut_Org crrr on crrr.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID LEFT JOIN core_Paper cp on cp.PapID=crpr.CitingPapID LEFT JOIN (SELECT cpu.PubID,cpif.IFactor,cpu.`Name` from core_PubIF cpif ,core_Publication cpu where cpu.PubID = cpif.PubID and cpif.YearID=2014) kk on kk.PubID = cp.PubID where crpao.AutID=#{aid} and crrr.AutRank=1 and kk.IFactor is not null GROUP BY kk.`Name`,kk.IFactor ORDER BY count desc limit #{limit};
